requirements.summary: Disable all PWA behavior (no manifest, no service worker registration/caching, no offline fallback UI).
acceptanceCriteria: The site does not register a service worker in production (no /sw.js registration).
frontend/index.html no longer includes PWA-specific metadata/links (at minimum: <link rel='manifest'> and Apple web app meta tags are removed).
The app UI does not show PWA/offline-status UI intended for PWA mode (e.g., OfflineNotice is not rendered).
/manifest.webmanifest and /offline.html are no longer referenced by the app entry HTML or runtime code.

file_operations.description: Remove PWA metadata/links (manifest link and Apple web app meta tags) and ensure no references remain to /manifest.webmanifest or other installability-related tags.
Disable service worker registration behavior so production builds never attempt to register /sw.js (website-first delivery).
Ensure the app bootstrap does not call any service worker registration helper and does not wire in any PWA-only runtime behavior.
Remove rendering of the PWA offline-status UI (e.g., OfflineNotice) so no PWA/offline banner appears during normal website usage.
Delete the PWA manifest so it cannot be served/used for installability.
Delete the offline fallback page so the site has no offline fallback experience.
Delete the service worker script so no caching/offline behavior can be enabled.

requirements.summary: Expand the landing page into a fully clickable demo with working navigation and CTA flows (no dead links).
acceptanceCriteria: Primary navigation items and the main CTA buttons all lead somewhere meaningful within the website (either scroll-to sections or routed pages) and do not result in no-op clicks.
If sections are used: each nav item scrolls to an existing section with matching anchor/id, and each section contains non-trivial placeholder content (headings, paragraphs, and at least one action).
If routed pages are used: each nav item changes the view to a dedicated page, and each page contains non-trivial placeholder content and at least one CTA that navigates to another page/section.
No console errors occur when using the navigation and CTAs.

file_operations.description: Create an About section component with id="about" containing non-trivial placeholder content and at least one CTA that navigates to another section. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a Contact section component with id="contact" containing non-trivial placeholder content and at least one CTA that navigates to another section (e.g., back to features or top). Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button) for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the new About and Contact sections into the landing page so header/footer navigation items (#about, #contact) scroll to real sections and all content is reachable.

Ensure all primary nav items scroll to existing section ids and update the 'Get Started' CTA to navigate meaningfully (e.g., scroll to #contact or #about). Keep using shadcn-ui Sheet/Button for mobile/desktop CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Make the hero CTA buttons navigate to meaningful on-site destinations (e.g., scroll to #features, #about, or #contact) with no dead clicks. Keep using the shadcn-ui Button component for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Replace footer 'Resources' dead links (#) with meaningful in-site links (anchors to existing sections) so the footer contains no no-op navigation.

requirements.summary: Update branding and copy to be website-focused and remove PWA-centric language from UI and metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: The visible header branding text no longer says 'Web PWA'.
frontend/index.html title and meta description are updated to describe a website (not a Progressive Web App).
Any remaining PWA-centric copy in the UI is removed or rewritten to website-centric language.

file_operations.description: Update document title and meta description to website-focused branding/copy (remove Progressive Web App wording).

Update visible header branding text to remove 'Web PWA' and use website-first naming. Keep using shadcn-ui components already in use (Button/Sheet). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Update footer branding and descriptive copy to remove PWA/install-focused language and reflect a standard website demo.

Rewrite hero pill text, description, and metrics to remove install/offline/PWA-centric claims and replace them with website-demo-focused placeholder copy. Keep using shadcn-ui Button for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Rewrite feature titles/descriptions to remove PWA-centric features (install/offline/auto updates) and replace with website-first placeholder benefits while continuing to use the existing shadcn-ui Card primitives already referenced. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
